data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I have to fly for work very early this morning. I ____ to ____ to ____ train ____ at ____ in ____ morning. There ____ no ____ going ____ the ____ at ____ hour. I will have to take a taxi to get there.
data.partBlankContent: I have to fly for work very early this morning. I ne__ to g_ to t__ train sta____ at fi__ in t__ morning. There i_ no b__ going t_ the sta____ at th__ hour. I will have to take a taxi to get there.
data.fullContent: I have to fly for work very early this morning. I need to go to the train station at five in the morning. There is no bus going to the station at that hour. I will have to take a taxi to get there.
data.answer: 今天早上我很早就得坐飞机去上班。我需要在早上5点去火车站。那个时候没有去车站的公共汽车。我将不得不乘出租车去那里。
